website_summaries.verdict: For curly hair and sensitive skin, this is the best choice.
pros: This gentle shaver can give a close shave without irritating the skin
A single charge lasts for several uses, and this shaver works well on heads as well as faces

customer_reviews.title: Worth at least a 4.5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give this a 4.5 star. The razor cuts short hairs only, nothing longer that 3 days of stubble. For those hairs, the razor work fantastically. I strongly recommend this razor and will continue to use. When used correctly it provides the best cut of all razors I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Shopper

customer_reviews.title: not so
customer_reviews.text: 65 days working then stopped. bought new charger still not working. cheaply made. no recourse. not worth it. went out last week and paid the right price for global brand
customer_reviews.author: Hank s.

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing; left my face almost as if I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing;left my face almost as if I had shaved with a razor,only problem was that battery died.Probably because of the way I cleaned it.Got a refund,& am planning to get it again,that's how much I liked it.Definitely better than Wahl foil shaver
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Amazing coming from a hairstylist
customer_reviews.text: As a hairstylist who does many bald fades- this is wonderful! It takes off the littlest stubble.
customer_reviews.author: bugaboo

customer_reviews.title: You have to be careful no to press hard against skin. Works great over all.
customer_reviews.text: The ability to shave unexpected is good. Does not shave as close as razor. That goes for all similar product. Works well, does the job smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Never worked again after initial battery charge drained
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold charge at all. I plug it in, full battery - light turns green. Unplug it, and it doesn’t work. What a piece of garbage. Defective unit?? I’m so surprised this product stopped working
customer_reviews.author: george chikko

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I don’t see what is supposed to be so great about this.. it hardly shaves at all. Makes noise like it is, yet still leaves plenty of stubs making you have to shave anyway. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Makes you bleed!!
customer_reviews.text: This is only good if you have some growth. It hardly shaves leaving almost all the stubs! Extremely disappointing and it cut me at the throat line, causing bleeding, extreme redness and irritation afterwards!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: I still had to shave
customer_reviews.text: This thing really messed up my face. wouldn't even get all the hairs. left me with razor burn on my face which is really embarrassing. returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas statham

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I collected my package this week only to realize that the machine is not working good at all. I’m not at work leased with this car reduction. The machine came faulty and I was very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, and well-made. However, it does not cut low enough, it still leaves some stubbles. I will use this along with a razor. Would not buy again, due to the aforementioned.
customer_reviews.author: Man of Valor

customer_reviews.title: Well let's see cuts great but broke after two charges
customer_reviews.text: Well let's see cuts great but broke after two charges . Two weeks later have to buy another ! The charging port broke because it need so much pressure to connect the cord ! Hope it was a fluke thing where the charging cable didn't fit easily in the port . But it balds my head it amazingly !
customer_reviews.author: dimetrios c.

customer_reviews.title: It sucks.
customer_reviews.text: on month two battery completely stopped working, must be plugged in to work. It sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Close cut
customer_reviews.text: Super close cut! Husband uses it to shave his head after using regular trimmer and gets as close as a razor would without the hassle or the pain..
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loves it
customer_reviews.text: A very close shave! Just make sure to follow the directions and not push the razor into you skin, which it tells you NOT to do, or it will give some irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Exelent product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really neat, exactly what i was looking for...trims really tight..like bald bald look.. and vattery life so far really good...
customer_reviews.author: Koboluchy

customer_reviews.title: Better than norelco!
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the Panasonic Norelco i had, no irritating!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job getting the stuble off your
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job getting the stuble off your. Almost as close as shaving your head. Keeps a charge for a long time. Easy to clean. Would recommend this if you want a really close shave on the head. I do the balding clippers then this. Nice and close
customer_reviews.author: Bob Andolina

customer_reviews.title: Works great on short or stubble hair
customer_reviews.text: Need a separate trimmer for longer hair. Works great on short or stubble hair. Shave my head every morning.
customer_reviews.author: HEAVY DUTY !!!

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this product. He does use a regular shaver just to make the hairs on his face smaller, but then goes over it with this and it's very very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Good Shaver. Disappointed when battery caught fire.
customer_reviews.text: Great shaver. Always kept the face smooth. Disappointed that the products battery melting through the casing during a regular charge.
customer_reviews.author: Zachery Levelle

customer_reviews.title: A friend referred him to it and it works wonders to that awesome shine he has
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as he shaves his head as well as beard. He loves it! A friend referred him to it and it works wonders to that awesome shine he has! Thank u so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have addition to your babrering tools!
customer_reviews.text: Been 6 months now and still going strong. I love love LOVE this foil shaver. And so do my clients ☺
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my husbands head and beard. Requires passing over and over till you are to tired to finish. Does not work well at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... shaver is Ok doesn't get as close as I like but it will do
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is Ok doesn't get as close as I like but it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick T.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much does it's job
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much does it's job, cuts down to the skin. Only bad thing, had it for 2 months now and the foil on cutter broke open.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Galvan

customer_reviews.title: Great until it STOPPED working
customer_reviews.text: Last exactly one month and stopped working. How can I return this?
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ma

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use either
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas, he's used it less than 5 times and it's broken. Not easy to use either. Missed the return deadline by 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Thompson

customer_reviews.title: They're very fine and it doesn't work very
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my son who has alopecia to clean up some random hairs. They're very fine and it doesn't work very well
customer_reviews.author: David Craft

customer_reviews.title: shaver grill was broken, it scratch me all over ...
customer_reviews.text: shaver grill was broken , it scratch me all over , had to buy the replacement head ...
customer_reviews.author: Juan Jusino

customer_reviews.title: I like them much better than the wahl shaver
customer_reviews.text: I'm a barber, I use these everyday for bald fades. I like them much better than the wahl shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best Of The Best since sliced bread and pockets on T-Shirts. * * * * *
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great (despite the loudness) and makes my face feel and look smooth! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Comewel

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected but it gets the job done ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected but it gets the job done. I'm faster shaving my head with a Mach 3 razor
customer_reviews.author: edward

customer_reviews.title: The Razor I've Been Looking For
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing razor I've even owned and I'm very particular. This the closest shave I've had in years and at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: like, overnight
customer_reviews.text: My husband has to be part werewolf -- dude can grow a beard, like, overnight. I've given him multiple electric shavers throughout the years, but he literally thanks me every time he uses this shaver! Did the touch test (with my hands, you filthy beggars!) and the shave he gets with this shaver is as good as a razor shave. Actually, better, because no razor burn! I was in danger of having a husband with one of those disgusting hipster beards because he hated shaving so much. Thank you Andis! This shaver is freaking ah-mazing.
customer_reviews.author: The Prude Reviews

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE READ ANDIS !
customer_reviews.text: Got it March 8th. Quit working May 24th-ish. Recharged it one day. After 1/2 it was hot and quit working. Worked pretty good. Threw away box after a week or so. I cant return or get a new one unless somebody reads this From Andis or whoever to send me a new one. If I don't hear back I will go to WAHL to try there's. now I wish I would've just did that first place. Would be happy to write a new review though if compensated for my loss. 😢 F Poor fella.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Bromberek

customer_reviews.title: excellent shaved for that clean smooth look
customer_reviews.text: Light weight , excellent shaved for that clean smooth look.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: it wasnt as good as the one my Barbour use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Norelco, Braun, and Panasonic over the past 50 years. I finally switched to wet shaving using a double edge blade and shaving brush, but it was taking too much time, although I got a close shave. I happened across a review of the And is and decided to give it a try. Wow! The closest shave I've ever had with an electric and certainly equal or better than my blade razor. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Not for daily, general use. Butter smooth when it works!
customer_reviews.text: This shaver is not ideal for daily, personal use. I've been using it for about a month to shave in the morning. It can't match the contours of my face, especially around my cheek bones and Adams Apple. If your stubble has grown longer, even just a weekend worth of not shaving, the shaver really struggles to cut through it. Overall, I wouldn't recommend this for the general guy looking for a quick, close shave in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: bigdrummer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all!!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were supposed to be done higher end shavers?!?! I ordered 1 and it died within a few weeks and then I couldn't charge it anymore/it wouldn't turn back on. I received a replacement. Now with my second one it lasted 2 months and the same thing... It died! It won't charge any more, I can't turn it back on... Not happy at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Fabrizi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It gives a very close shave. Way closer than just using an andis T outliner. It cuts close as if I used a razor without leaving any ingrown hair.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this shaver so far
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this shaver so far. I use it on the sides and back of my head... almost as good as shaving with my Mach III and much quicker/easier.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Buckmaster

customer_reviews.title: Good razor, but only for short beard.
customer_reviews.text: This gives a close finish, which is fine. When I have a couple of days growth, it doesn't shave too well.
customer_reviews.author: HAT

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Even when cutting 10-20 men's heads a day, this shaver is reliable and quiet. Be careful with foil top, use protector. Great value, just what I needed and way better than my previous Wahl!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H

customer_reviews.title: Very good shaver
customer_reviews.text: I bought numerous shavers in the past and this has been by far the best . Easy to use , easy to clean , and holds a charge .
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Have shaved with this for a few weeks on only one charge!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: works only with short whiskers; tends to irritate the skin
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Wilbanks

customer_reviews.title: Great for barbers
customer_reviews.text: Great for bald shave not as close a razor if you shaved your skin but pretty clean and smooth if your skin is soft great for barbers if you don't want to use a razor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great shaver.
customer_reviews.text: Really great shaver.. I’ve used it at least 10 times and haven’t had to charge the battery.. shaves close without irritation.. will recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: pj glenn

customer_reviews.title: Crap. Flimsy screen.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. The screen broke after a month. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Uneven cut
customer_reviews.text: Uneven. Gives some of your head a close double zero cut and some closer to 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: JR Dababneh

customer_reviews.title: It cuts like a razor
customer_reviews.text: It cuts like a razor, and works great, plus it's not over priced. I had the Fiver star Shaver, but it needed to be repaired to many times. Great job Andis.
customer_reviews.author: jormor caines

customer_reviews.title: that machine does not work does not shave well and ...
customer_reviews.text: that machine does not work does not shave well and for the high is Chinese that serves less of the time I have in amazon when I bought that machine that day was the one that I felt cheated and stolen 06/09/2017
customer_reviews.author: andris

customer_reviews.title: Not effective!
customer_reviews.text: These shavers do not shave well. I have tried using these shavers but with no success. You will have to have about 1 to 2 days of beard growth, anything more it will not cut. I initially thought they were defective. not sure how they will fade either. I will update my review if I have any success in the future. maybe I should have got the Wahl shavers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a TOTAL WASTE of money. It never shaved well. Long -lasting only because I didn't toss it in the trash right away
customer_reviews.author: D. Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after two months
customer_reviews.text: The razor worked well, but I have had two months and it no longer will charge. It is a shame because I liked it.
customer_reviews.author: David Miller

product_meta.title: Andis Cordless Mens Long Lasting Lithium Battery Titanium Foil Shaver with Beauwis Blade cleaning Brush
product_meta.description: Andis Cordless Mens Long Lasting Lithium Battery Titanium Foil Shaver with a BeauWis Brush
feature_bullets: Delivers over 1 hour of runtime on a single charge - 2x longer than other shavers.
Gold titanium hypo-allergenic foil for irritation-free shaving.
